exclusion_shipping_cost.title: Management of delivery costs by means of payment
exclusion_shipping_cost.explain: Some payment methods don't legally allow to pay shipping costs. You can select the payment methods which don't allow to pay these shipping costs. If a customer chooses one of theses payment methods, he will pay his shipping costs with an another payment method.

label.label: Payment methods not compatible with shipping costs

errors.display_form: An error occurred while building shipping payments form.
